meanings.sent1: Her booklore helped her ace the literature exam.
meanings.sent2: She spent hours at the library, absorbing booklore.
meanings.sent3: The booklore in his head made him the go-to person for book recommendations.
meanings.sent4: Her booklore was a treasure trove of literary facts and stories.
meanings.sent5: The booklore she possessed was like a library in her mind.

meanings.definition: The traditions, practices, and beliefs surrounding books and reading.
meanings.sent1: The booklore of the ancient library fascinated historians.
meanings.sent2: In their family, booklore was passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: The booklore club met every week to discuss their favorite reads.
meanings.sent4: His booklore was so deep, it was like diving into a sea of stories.
meanings.sent5: The booklore of the book club members created a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
